attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all sign this petition here to ask for Tim Lovejoy to be brought back to the number 1 saturday morning football show. Soccer A.M. 

The reason for this is because the current presenter Max Rushden is so ill-humoured and the shows ratings have been dropped dramaticaly.

It would be great for this petition to be approved.

The footballing public.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
